title: Online Reflection-Based Teaching Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining online reflective assignments with offline feedback.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers enhance their critical analysis skills of lesson design processes by writing reflective journals twice weekly over four weeks.
Learners evaluate various instructional strategies based on case studies presented in online modules and construct practical knowledge applicable to actual classes.

Participants revise an educational philosophy statement (500 characters) based on at least three peer feedback sessions and demonstrate professional identity development by achieving "excellent" or higher in at least four of five rubric items for teacher professional identity assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
